ARABIC: قَٰلَ إِن لَّبِثْتُمْ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا لَّوْ أَنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He will say, 'You only tarried there for a little while if you did but know!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He will say: "You stayed there only a moment, if you knew.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He will say: "You stayed only for a while, if you only knew that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God will say, "You have indeed remained there for a short time. Would that you knew it during your life time.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He will say, “You stayed but only a little, if you knew.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He will say: "You stayed not but a little, if you had only known!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He will say: You did tarry but a little-- had you but known (it):
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He shall say, 'You have tarried but a little, did you know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He will say: Ye tarried but a little if ye only knew.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He will say, "You only stayed for a little while, if only you knew.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He will say: ye tarried a little indeed; would that ye had known that:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He will say, ‘You only remained a little; if only you had known.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He will say: "Ye stayed not but a little,- if ye had only known!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He (Allah) will say: "You stayed not but a little, if you had only known!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He will say: 'You have tarried a little, did you know?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He will say, “You remained only for a little while, if you only knew.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He will say, "You stayed not but a little - if only you had known.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:114] He, exalted, will say, to them, also by the tongue of Keeper [of Hell] (a variant reading [for qāla, ‘He will say’] has qul, ‘say’): ‘You tarried but a little, if only you knew, the length of time you tarried, [you would have realised that it is] trivial relative to how long you will tarry in the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He will say) Allah will say to them: (Ye tarried) you remained in your graves (but a little) in comparison to your dwelling in hell (if ye only knew) this; He says: if you only believe what I say; it is also said that this means: if only you did believe in My prophets in the life of the world, you would know now that you remained in your graves but a short time.
